text: ان فى ذلك لءاية وما كان اكثرهم مؤمنين

translations.translation: There is certainly a Sign in that, yet most of them are not muminun.
Verily there is a sign in this, yet many of them do not believe.
Surely there is a Sign in this, but most of them would not believe.
In this there is evidence (of the truth) but most of them do not have any faith.
Indeed in this is a sign; and most of them were not believers.
Verily, in this is indeed a sign, yet most of them are not believers.
Most surely there is a sign in this, but most of them do not believe.
Surely in that is a sign, yet most of them are not believers.
Lo! herein is indeed a portent, yet most of them are not believers.
There is certainly a sign in that; but most of them do not believe:
Verily herein is a sign, yet most of them are not believers.
There is indeed a sign in that; but most of them do not have faith.
Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
Verily, in this is indeed a sign, yet most of them are not believers.
Surely, in that there is a sign; yet most of them do not believe.
In that is a sign, but most of them are not believers.
Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
[26:121]   Surely in that there is a sign; but most of them are not believers.

(Lo! Herein) in that which We did with them (is indeed a portent) a sign and an admonition to those who came after them, (yet most of them are not believers) they were not believers and most of them were disbelievers.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { إِنَّ فِي ذَلِكَ } الإنجاء والإغراق { لآيَةً } عظيمة دالة على كمال قدرتنا وسطوتنا وعلو شأننا وبسطتنا { وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم } أي: أكثر الناس { مُّؤْمِنِينَ } [الشعراء: 121] بوحدة وجودنا، وكمال قدرتنا وعزتنا، ومتانة حكمنا وحكمتنا
